headline: Snowflake OpenAI Deal Shifts Data Platform Deeper Into Enterprise AI
summary: Snowflake (NYSE:SNOW) and OpenAI agreed a multi-year partnership to deliver enterprise-grade AI agents directly on customer data within Snowflake’s platform. The collaboration gives enterprises access to OpenAI models, including GPT-5.2, for governed AI workloads on their existing Snowflake data. Snowflake also introduced new AI products such as Semantic View Autopilot and Cortex Code, alongside expanded data governance and collaboration features. Customer deployments include United Rentals,...
